CustomField.description: INTEG - N || ** eBay Advertising ** || WF - N || AP - N || VAL - N ||Class - N || Definition: First Time Client||
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Party__c,"Advertiser") && Account.Opportunities_Won__c = 0,true , IF(ISPICKVAL(Bill_To_Party__c,"Agency") && Agency__r.Opportunities_Won__c = 0,false, false) )
CustomField.label: First Time Client
